statements: SELECT * FROM operational_efficiency_metrics;
SELECT organization_id, metric_name FROM operational_efficiency_metrics WHERE metric_value > 100;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM operational_efficiency_metrics ORDER BY metric_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM operational_efficiency_metrics WHERE organization_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT metric_timestamp, AVG(metric_value) as avg_value FROM operational_efficiency_metrics GROUP BY metric_timestamp;
SELECT organization_id, metric_name, metric_value, metric_timestamp FROM operational_efficiency_metrics WHERE organization_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY metric_timestamp DESC
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM operational_efficiency_metrics WHERE metric_timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00'
SELECT * FROM operational_efficiency_metrics WHERE organization_id = '98765432-AAAA-BBBB-CCCC-123456789000'
SELECT AVG(metric_value) AS average_value, organization_id FROM operational_efficiency_metrics GROUP BY organization_id ORDER BY organization_id
SELECT organization_id, metric_name, metric_timestamp FROM operational_efficiency_metrics WHERE metric_value BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY organization_id ASC
SELECT * FROM organization_metrics WHERE metric_value > 1000
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM organization_metrics ORDER BY metric_name DESC
SELECT * FROM organization_metrics WHERE metric_name LIKE 'P%'
SELECT metric_id, metric_value FROM organization_metrics WHERE metric_value < 500 ORDER BY metric_value ASC
SELECT platform_name, platform_vendor FROM bi_platforms
SELECT metric_id, metric_name, metric_value FROM organization_metrics WHERE metric_value > 100
SELECT platform_id, platform_name, platform_vendor, platform_version FROM bi_platforms
SELECT metric_name, metric_value, metric_id FROM organization_metrics WHERE metric_value < 50 ORDER BY metric_name DESC
SELECT platform_name, platform_vendor, platform_version FROM bi_platforms WHERE platform_vendor = 'Tableau'
SELECT * FROM organization_metrics JOIN bi_platforms ON organization_metrics.metric_id = bi_platforms.platform_id
SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT full_name, position FROM employees WHERE department='Technology';
SELECT full_name, hire_date FROM employees WHERE position='Manager' AND hire_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT department_name, location FROM departments;
SELECT metric_name, value FROM metrics WHERE date_recorded BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT full_name, position FROM employees WHERE department='HR' ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT department_name, location FROM departments WHERE location='New York' AND department_id > 5;
SELECT employee_id, full_name, hire_date FROM employees JOIN departments ON employees.department = departments.department_name;
SELECT metric_name, value, date_recorded FROM metrics WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY date_recorded DESC;
SELECT * FROM BusinessMetrics;
SELECT metric_name, value FROM BusinessMetrics WHERE date_recorded = '2022-05-01';
SELECT * FROM OperationalProcesses ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT platform_name, vendor, version FROM BusinessIntelligencePlatforms WHERE platform_id = 2;
SELECT metric_value AS value, metric_date AS date FROM ProcessMetrics WHERE process_id = 1 ORDER BY metric_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM BusinessMetrics ORDER BY metric_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT metric_id, metric_name, value FROM BusinessMetrics WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY value DESC
SELECT metric_name, value, date_recorded FROM BusinessMetrics WHERE metric_name LIKE '%sales%' AND date_recorded >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date_recorded
SELECT * FROM OperationalProcesses WHERE department_id = 4 AND start_date < '2022-02-01' AND end_date > '2021-12-31' ORDER BY process_id
SELECT platform_name, vendor, version FROM BusinessIntelligencePlatforms WHERE version BETWEEN 5.0 AND 7.0 ORDER BY version
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT id, name, department FROM employees WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT id, name FROM employees ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, department, salary FROM employees WHERE department = 'Finance';
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT name, department FROM employees WHERE salary > 50000 ORDER BY department DESC;
SELECT name, department, salary FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR' OR department = 'Marketing';
SELECT e.name, d.location, p.status FROM departments d JOIN employees e ON d.id = e.id JOIN processes p ON e.department = p.department_id ORDER BY d.location ASC, p.status DESC;

SELECT e.name, p.name, pm.metric_name, pm.metric_value FROM employees e JOIN processes p ON e.department = p.department_id JOIN performance_metrics pm ON e.id = pm.employee_id WHERE pm.metric_value > 0.8 ORDER BY pm.metric_value DESC, e.name ASC;
